## LoadMorePagingComponent class

Paging that uses simple button to load more content

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class LoadMorePagingComponent extends PagingAbstractComponent<CssClassesLoadMorePaging, LoadMorePagingOptions> implements LoadMorePaging, OnDestroy 
```
